item.title: Alvey add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Saying 'I notice you're a nerd' is like saying, 'Hey, I notice that you'd rather be intelligent than be stupid, that you'd rather be thoughtful than be vapid, that you believe that there are things that matter more than the arrest record of Lindsay Lohan. Why is that?' In fact, it seems to me that most contemporary insults are pretty lame. Even 'lame' is kind of lame. Saying 'You're lame' is like saying 'You walk with a limp.' Yeah, whatever, so does 50 Cent, and he's done all right for himself." -- John Green

item.title: Alvey add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Alvey add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. " -- Walt Disney

item.title: Alvey add a quote by Walt Disney
item.description: "Our greatest national resource is the minds of our children." -- Walt Disney

item.title: Alvey add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and theyâ€™ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Alvey add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description:
"Libraries should be open to all - except the censor.
<i>[Response to questionnaire in Saturday Review, October 29 1960]</i>" -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Alvey add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "We must find time to stop and thank the people who make a difference in our lives." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Alvey add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Alvey add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Alvey add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I try to live life so that I can live with myself." -- John Green
